Histogram data

Source: R/rfm-plots-data.R
rfm_hist_data.Rd

Data for generating histograms.

rfm_hist_data(rfm_table)

Arguments

rfm_table

An object of class rfm_table.

Examples

# using transaction data
analysis_date <- lubridate::as_date('2006-12-31')
rfm_order <- rfm_table_order(rfm_data_orders, customer_id, order_date,
revenue, analysis_date)

# histogram data
rfm_hist_data(rfm_order)
#> # A tibble: 2,985 x 2
#>    rfm          score
#>    <chr>        <dbl>
#>  1 recency_days   205
#>  2 recency_days   140
#>  3 recency_days   194
#>  4 recency_days   132
#>  5 recency_days    90
#>  6 recency_days    84
#>  7 recency_days   281
#>  8 recency_days   246
#>  9 recency_days   349
#> 10 recency_days   619
#> # ... with 2,975 more rows

# using customer data
analysis_date <- lubridate::as_date('2007-01-01')
rfm_customer <- rfm_table_customer(rfm_data_customer, customer_id,
number_of_orders, recency_days, revenue, analysis_date)

# histogram data
rfm_hist_data(rfm_customer)
#> # A tibble: 119,997 x 2
#>    rfm          score
#>    <chr>        <dbl>
#>  1 recency_days   232
#>  2 recency_days   115
#>  3 recency_days    43
#>  4 recency_days    64
#>  5 recency_days    23
#>  6 recency_days    72
#>  7 recency_days   112
#>  8 recency_days   142
#>  9 recency_days    43
#> 10 recency_days   131
#> # ... with 119,987 more rows
